content.comment: They BLEW the ROOF off at their last show, once everyone started figuring out they were going. This is still simply the greatest opening of a concert I have EVER witnessed.
Every time I see him shred I feel so motivated to get off my couch and hop on my board. He’s so talented! I wish I can ride like him one day so I can really enjoy mysel!
How can someone be so good!!! You can tell he lives for this and loves to do it every day. Everytime I see him I feel instantly happy! He’s definitely my favorite ever!
